name: Trial of the Gods
description: Challenge your wits, test your mettle, prove you are worthy of a second chance by completing the riddles and puzzles of the Egyptian Gods! Escape from the ancient Egyptian tomb or seal your fate forever!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForceGTX970 or Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
